statements: SELECT * FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio;
SELECT company_name, industry_sector FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio ORDER BY industry_sector ASC;
SELECT * FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio WHERE revenue > 1000000;
SELECT company_name, profit FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio WHERE investment_amount < 500000;
SELECT company_id, company_name, industry_sector, profit FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 500000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT industry_sector, COUNT(*) AS num_companies FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio GROUP BY industry_sector;
SELECT company_name, revenue, profit FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio WHERE revenue > profit * 2;
SELECT company_name, industry_sector, profit FROM private_equity_firms_portfolio WHERE revenue BETWEEN 1000000 AND 5000000 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_companies;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM portfolio_companies WHERE industry='Technology';
SELECT company_name, employees FROM portfolio_companies ORDER BY employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 100000;
SELECT company_name, industry, revenue FROM portfolio_companies WHERE revenue > 1000000 AND industry='Healthcare';
SELECT * FROM portfolio_companies WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY employees DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM portfolio_companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM portfolio_companies WHERE employees > 500 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry, revenue FROM portfolio_companies WHERE industry = 'Finance' AND revenue < 50000;
SELECT company_name, employees FROM portfolio_companies WHERE employees BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY employees ASC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_companies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM portfolio_companies;
SELECT revenue, profit FROM financial_performance WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT company_name, industry, location FROM portfolio_companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT company_name, industry, decision_date, decision_reason FROM portfolio_companies JOIN investment_decisions ON portfolio_companies.company_id = investment_decisions.company_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_companies WHERE industry='Technology';
SELECT company_name, location FROM portfolio_companies WHERE location='New York';
SELECT company_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_performance GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT company_name, year, profit FROM financial_performance WHERE year BETWEEN 2019 AND 2021 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT decision_date, decision_reason FROM investment_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM portfolio_companies;
SELECT * FROM financial_performance WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT user_name, email FROM firm_users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, total_investment FROM portfolio_companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT sum(revenue) AS total_revenue, sum(expenses) AS total_expenses FROM financial_performance WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM portfolio_companies;
SELECT * FROM financial_performance WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT company_id, company_name, total_investment FROM portfolio_companies WHERE industry = 'Tech';
SELECT user_id, user_name, role FROM firm_users ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT company_name, revenue, expenses FROM portfolio_companies JOIN financial_performance ON portfolio_companies.company_id = financial_performance.company_id WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_companies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM portfolio_companies WHERE year_founded > 2010;
SELECT * FROM financial_performance ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT company_name, total_investment FROM portfolio_companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM investment_team WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT company_name, total_investment FROM portfolio_companies ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT industry FROM portfolio_companies;
SELECT pc.company_name, fp.revenue, fp.profit FROM portfolio_companies pc INNER JOIN financial_performance fp ON pc.company_id = fp.company_id WHERE fp.year = 2021 AND fp.revenue > 1000000;

SELECT it.team_name, it.specialization, COUNT(ic.company_id) AS total_investments FROM investment_team it LEFT JOIN investment_decisions ic ON it.team_id = ic.company_id GROUP BY it.team_name, it.specialization ORDER BY total_investments DESC;
